trans-unit.source: Built-In Desired State Configuration Resources for Linux
trans-unit.target: Built-In Desired State Configuration Resources for Linux

trans-unit.source: Resources are building blocks that you can use to write a PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) script.
trans-unit.target: Resources are building blocks that you can use to write a PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) script.

trans-unit.source: DSC for Linux comes with a set of built-in functionality for configuring resources such as files and folders, packages, environment variables, and services and processes.
trans-unit.target: DSC for Linux comes with a set of built-in functionality for configuring resources such as files and folders, packages, environment variables, and services and processes.

trans-unit.source: The following table provides a list of these resources and links to topics that describe them in detail.
trans-unit.target: The following table provides a list of these resources and links to topics that describe them in detail.

trans-unit.source: [nxArchive Resource](lnxArchiveResource.md)--Provides a mechanism to unpack archive (.tar, .zip) files at a specific path.
trans-unit.target: [nxArchive Resource](lnxArchiveResource.md)--Provides a mechanism to unpack archive (.tar, .zip) files at a specific path.

trans-unit.source: [nxFileLine Resource](lnxFileLineResource.md)--Manages individual lines in a Linux file.
trans-unit.target: [nxFileLine Resource](lnxFileLineResource.md)--Manages individual lines in a Linux file.

trans-unit.source: [nxPackage Resource](lnxPackageResource.md)--Manages packages on Linux nodes.- [nxScript Resource](lnxScriptResource.md)--Runs scripts on target nodes.
trans-unit.target: [nxPackage Resource](lnxPackageResource.md)--Manages packages on Linux nodes.- [nxScript Resource](lnxScriptResource.md)--Runs scripts on target nodes.

trans-unit.source: [nxSshAuthorizedKeys Resource](lnxSshAuthorizedKeysResource.md)--Manages public ssh keys for a Linux user.
trans-unit.target: [nxSshAuthorizedKeys Resource](lnxSshAuthorizedKeysResource.md)--Manages public ssh keys for a Linux user.
